newsitem.title: UK: NWE straight-run fuel oil steady despite crude gains.
newsitem.headline: NWE straight-run fuel oil steady despite crude gains.

text.p: European straight-run fuel oil was steady despite crude oil's gains as refiners preferred alternative feedstocks, traders said.

Some Russian E-4 cargoes were hanging over the northern European market, and available at a weaker $2 premium to the formula. The formula was expected to jump sharply on Friday night with cracked prices, and the E-4 premium expected to fall.
Low sulphur supply was tight, and prices steady around $146 fob NWE.
